overview: Prem Mayee is a story of people in love and the circumstances that push them only to realise the inevitable... that love brings out the BEST and the WORST in us.Its about love that can give abundance of joy, reassurance, positivity, success, fulfilment and yet it can go on to cause unhappiness, hurt, negativity. Prem Mayee further throws light on women's place in society, marraige, relationships and work-place.
title: Prem Mayee
